articles.content: MMA star Tony Ferguson has been seen for the first time after he was rushed to hospital following his brutal loss to Justin Gaethje at UFC 249.El Cucuy, who entered the event on a 12-fight winning streak, was left a battered mess as he forfeited the chance to… [+1813 chars]

articles.title: Kalyn Ponga backs housemate Tex Hoy for Knights' No.1 jersey - Wide World of Sports
articles.description: Billy Slater lesson passed down in clubland
articles.content:
Kalyn Ponga will take the same hands-off approach Billy Slater once offered him when readying young gun Tex Hoy to fill his shoes at Newcastle.
Slater gently groomed Ponga to inherit his fullback jersey at Queensland, and the Knights' star will adopt the sam… [+1831 chars]

articles.author: Andrew Eddy - @fastisheddy
articles.title: Runaway jumps at Cup chance - Racing.com
articles.description: Owners daring to dream of another Melbourne Cup start?
articles.content:
It is incredible what a glimmer of hope can do to the minds of racehorse owners.
Take the owners of 2018 VRC St Leger winner Runaway, who later that year finished 19th in the Melbourne Cup.
Focused solely on a jumps career for Runaway in 2020 after a spate … [+3595 chars]

articles.title: AFL releases in-depth statement on return to play situation - SEN
articles.description: The AFL has released a huge statement regarding the return of the league.
articles.content:
The AFL has released a statement saying they will provide a return to play and a return to training date by the end of the week.

articles.description: Tune into our new show Fox League Live on Channel 502 Monday to Friday at 6.30pm and on Saturday at 3pm and Sunday at 5pm.
articles.content:

articles.description: The UK government has given a tentative green light for the Premier League to return to action from June 1.
